title: AI drives new breakthroughs in drug discovery
content: Researchers leverage generative AI models to accelerate the identification of promising drug candidates, reducing timelines from years to months.

title: Quantum computing startup secures major funding
content: A leading quantum computing firm announced a $150M funding round to expand its fault-tolerant hardware research.

title: Renewable energy storage hits new milestone
content: Grid-scale battery deployments now exceed 500GWh globally, signaling rapid adoption of renewable storage solutions.

title: Autonomous vehicles begin limited city rollouts
content: Pilot programs for fully autonomous ride-hailing expand to three new metropolitan areas under strict safety oversight.

title: Cybersecurity report highlights rise in supply chain attacks
content: New data shows a 40% year-over-year increase in supply chain compromises, prompting calls for zero-trust adoption.

title: Breakthrough in battery recycling technologies
content: Innovative chemical processes recover up to 95% of lithium and cobalt, improving the sustainability of EV supply chains.

title: Edge AI chips see rapid adoption in IoT devices
content: Manufacturers integrate low-power AI accelerators to enable on-device inference for vision and audio workloads.

title: Satellites map methane emissions with greater precision
content: Next-gen Earth observation constellations track industrial methane leaks in near real-time, aiding climate monitoring.

title: Fintech platforms expand real-time cross-border payments
content: New partnerships allow instant settlement across 25 currencies, reducing transaction fees for SMEs.

title: Biotech firms apply CRISPR to climate-resilient crops
content: Gene-edited seeds show improved drought tolerance and yield stability in early field trials.
